organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide provides techniques for designers and facility operators to apply in determining the arc-flash hazard distance and the incident energy to which employees could be exposed during their work on or near electricalequipment. The changes to Clause 4 are to make use of the knowledge and experience of those who have performed studies as a guide in applying the standard.
